title: Car Broker Stephen Serio
description:
Stephen Serio is a vehicle acquisition agent - if you're made of money and want the best, you get a guy like Stephen, or, more likely, Stephen himself, to find it for you. He is also a photographer, Sports Car Market contributing writer, and collection management expert. IG: @therealbondgroup

 

Use code "TST175" for $175 off a purchase at Crown and Caliber 

 

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

 IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

WATCH the show! https://youtu.be/F1nznuyskPY
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
